c74object.name: sp.descriptorframe
c74object.digest: Analyzes audio for several audio desriptors based on frame input
c74object.description: Analyzes audio for several audio desriptors based on frame input.

discussion.p: The sp.descriptorframe object outputs loudness, centroid, spectral flatness, and pitch along with the derivatives for loudness/centroid/flatness and confidence for pitch.

inlet.description: Frame to analyze from sp.onsetframe~, sp.realtimeframe~, or sp.triggerframe~

attribute.name: blocking
attribute.digest: Choose which thread to use for processing
attribute.description:
By default non-realtime objects use the Max main thread.
The available options are:
0: Non-blocking = Use a dedicated worker thread (for longer jobs)
1: Blocking (Low Priority) = Use Max main thread (for small jobs)
2: Blocking (High Priority) = Use calling thread (for very small jobs)

attribute.name: fftsettings
attribute.description:
FFT settings consist of three numbers representing the window size, hop size and FFT size in samples:
The hop size and fft size can both be set to -1 (and are by default), with slightly different meanings:
For the hop size, -1 = windowsize/2
For the FFT size, -1 = windowsize snapped to the nearest equal / greater power of 2 (e.g. windowsize 1024 => fftsize 1024, but windowssize 1000 also => fftsize 1024)
Constraints
FFTSize, if != -1, will snap to the next greatest power of two
if FFT size != -1, then window size is clipped at FFT size

attribute.name: numchans
attribute.description: For multichannel source, how many channels should be processed. The default of -1 indicates to analyse through the last channel in the buffer.

attribute.name: numframes
attribute.description: How many samples to analyse. The default of -1 indicates to analyse through to the end of the buffer~.

attribute.name: pitch
attribute.description: Includes the two pitch descriptors in the output.

attribute.name: realtime
attribute.digest: Runs in high-priority thread for realtime performance
attribute.description: Runs in high-priority thread when fast realtime performance is required.

attribute.name: source
attribute.digest: The buffer to use as source material
attribute.description: The buffer~ to use as the source material to be pitch-tracked. The different channels of multichannel buffers will be processed sequentially.

attribute.name: startframe
attribute.digest: WHere in the source to start analysis.
attribute.description: Where in source to start the analysis, in samples. The default is 0.

attribute.name: startchan
attribute.description: For multichannel source, from which channel to begin analysing. The default is 0.

entry.name: list
entry.description: Frame to analyze from sp.onsetframe~, sp.realtimeframe~, or sp.triggerframe~
